data.prayer: Jesus, purify the 334 believers in the state of Baie Sainte Anne to not just be hearers, but doers of your Word.
data.verse: Blessed is the one who reads aloud the words of this prophecy, and blessed are those who hear it and take to heart what is written in it, because the time is near.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Baie Sainte Anne, Seychelles
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Baie Sainte Anne, Seychelles.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 14 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, train the church of Baie Sainte Anne, Seychelles to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Baie Sainte Anne who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.
Lord, make the 334 believers in Baie Sainte Anne to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 4,466 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of Baie Sainte Anne.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.section_summary:
the state of Baie Sainte Anne, Seychelles has a population of 4,800.

We estimate Baie Sainte Anne has 334 people who might know Jesus, 4,283 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 183 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 14 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Baie Sainte Anne, Seychelles.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.
